name: Marty Tram
description:
Oh my ! The brakes have dropped! Choose the paths that will save the most lives.

This game was originally created for the Last Relics Game's game jam  (2022)
Theme : "Connexion".

Based on the "trawmway dilemma" theory, in this puzzle game, you will have to choose the right switch connection to find the path that will save the most lives!

Be careful, some dangers are hidden in the crowd.

Controls :

Right Click on the switch fo choose the  least worst path.

Credits :
  • Programming and Game Design : Frelude
  • Graphics : Madélou
  • Music : Amiamiami
